main.name: Kyle Cheung
main.description: In the business of turning ideas into realities
main.bio: I am a Toronto based Full-Stack Developer with experience in a variety of technologies and a passion for learning. I specialize in web development using the MERN stack(Mongodb, Express, React, Node). I also have experience developing applications using more traditional languages such as Java, Python, and C++. My interests also include Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence. Data excites me, and the many possible applications in the future keep me eager to keep on the edge of technogloy.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Data Structures & Algorithms, Operating Systems, Discrete Mathematics, Linear Algebra, Databases, Computer Networks, Software Design & Analysis, Artificial Intelligence, Software Tools, & Systems Programming

work.title: Contract Web Developer
work.description: Contracted to develop a Generational Accounting Calculator using React. I was in charge of building the app from the ground up and styling it using CSS and Javascript. I ensured browser compatibility with Internet Explorer as well as helped the employer set set up custom domains and launch the application.

work.title: I.T. Technician
work.description: I was responsible for conversing with clients and troubleshooting technical problems as smoothly as possible. I learned how to explain complex concepts as simply as possible as well as learning how to use administrative software to remotely help clients as well.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
